DOC.brief_summary: Comparing LASIK outcome use two femtosecond laser
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison LASIK Outcomes Using Two Femtosecond Lasers
DOC.detailed_description: Patients comprehensive eye examination express interest study . This include slit lamp examination front eye dilate fundoscopic examination back eye . If pathology note would exclude patient study , investigator inform patient make appropriate referral . Patients deem appropriate study comprehensive examination include computerized videokeratography enrol . Patients undergo bilateral simultaneous eye surgery . Which eye treat Intralase IFS 150 eye treat VisuMax randomize 50 % chance either eye receive one treatment . Patients see day surgery , post op day one , one month , three month , six month one year . Patients receive topical antibiotic eye one week follow procedure . Patients receive pred forte 1 % ophthalmic drop one week treatment . Patients also receive vigamox ophthalmic drop four day treatment . All within usual customary standard care treatment patient undergo LASIK surgery .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 21 old healthy eye . Nearsightedness 0.25 diopter 11.00 diopter without astigmatism 5.00 diopter . Subjects age 21 Subjects age 60 Subjects corneal ectatic disorder
